Package com.foreach.across.modules.entity.views.bootstrapui.options

Class OptionGenerator

java.lang.Object
com.foreach.across.modules.entity.views.bootstrapui.options.OptionGenerator
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.foreach.across.modules.web.ui.ViewElementBuilder<com.foreach.across.modules.web.ui.elements.ContainerViewElement>
Direct Known Subclasses:
FilterOptionGenerator
public class OptionGenerator extends Object implements com.foreach.across.modules.web.ui.ViewElementBuilder<com.foreach.across.modules.web.ui.elements.ContainerViewElement>

Wrapper that generates the children of an OptionsFormElementBuilder. Requires an OptionIterableBuilder that is responsible for creating the initial collection of OptionFormElementBuilders.

When the setSorted(Boolean)

property is true, the options will always be sorted by label and text in the resulting set. If unset, sorting will only happen if OptionIterableBuilder.isSorted() returns false.

In case of single option selector, an empty option will be added if none is selected or if the element is not required. The empty option can be overridden (and set to null) using setEmptyOption(OptionFormElementBuilder).

A single option will be automatically selected in case a selection is required.

Author:
Arne Vandamme
